content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max,

I am not obligated to disclose the rental price initially. Let's discuss the potential price range for the apartment. Remember, I am looking to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Of course, Mister Schmidt. How about 1000 Euro per month?

[Your response]
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because that's too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Understandable, Max. How about 1200 Euro per month?

[Your response] [
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think we can still go higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I am trying to be reasonable. How about 1300 Euro per month? I think that is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Your response] [
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I insist that 1300 Euro per month is a fair price. I don't want to go any higher.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Your response] [
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, as a final offer, I can give you the apartment for 1250 Euro per month. That is my final offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Your response] [
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I don't want to continue the negotiation. I think I have given you a fair offer.

content: [Your response] [

content: Max, I can't go lower than 1200 Euro per month. That's the lowest I can offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Your response] [
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I'm sorry but I can't lower the price any further. It's already at a very reasonable level. If you don't accept this price, I will have to look for other tenants.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Your response] [
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I will reduce the price to 1150 Euro per month. That's the lowest I can go. I hope we can agree on this price.
